Name: Kanji RPG
About the game: Kanji RPG is a 2D RPG-lite game designed to help you learn how to read Japanese! Learn new Kanji and Kana by fighting enemies in different areas, and keep track of your progress in your handy-dandy stamp book. Every so often, you'll fight bosses, which are much stronger enemies that gatekeep your ability to progress onto other areas of the game. You can also customize your character's appearance, use weapons, and other items, whether by finding them in battle or purchasing them from the shop. Currently, only Grade 1 is accessible, but the end goal of this game is to provide a platform for learning all 2136 Jouyou Kanji in one game!
